      int PL2303TB_Enable_GPIO(int index, int GPIO_Num, boolean Enable)
      PL2303TB has 12 software controllable ¡§General Purpose Input Output¡¨ control signal pin, you can use this API to control the direction of these pin, you also can use "PL2303HXD Enable GPIO" API to control GPIO 0~7 of PL2303TB
      int PL2303TB_Set_GPIO_Value(int index, int GPIO_Num, int val)
      PL2303TB has 12 software controllable ¡§General Purpose Input Output¡¨ control signal pin, you can use this API to control the status of these pin when the direction is output mode, you also can use "PL2303HXD_Set_GPIO_Value" API to control GPIO 0~7 of PL2303TB
      int PL2303TB_Set_PWM(int index, int PWM_IO_Num, byte Frequency_value, byte Duty_value)
      PL2303TB supports 4 PWM control output, the frequency range is from 366.3Hz to 46.5 KHz, and the pulse high duty can be set from 1/256 to 255/256 in each frequency.

      Detecting whether this Android OS supports USB host API feature

    • Constructor Detail

      • PL2303MultiLib

        public PL2303MultiLib(UsbManager manager,
                      Context context,
                      java.lang.String sAppName)
        Initialize a PL2303HXD driver, the software 4K Queue buffer is enable.
        Parameters:
        manager - [in] Initialize a PL2303HXD driver.
        context - [in] Initialize a PL2303HXD driver.
        sAppName - [in] , ACTION_USB_PERMISSION string, for example: "tw.com.prolific.pl2303hxdgpio.USB_PERMISSION" "com.prolific.pl2303hxdsimpletest.USB_PERMISSION" "XXX.AAA.CCC.USB_PERMISSION"

      • PL2303MultiLib

        public PL2303MultiLib(UsbManager manager,
                      Context context,
                      java.lang.String sAppName,
                      boolean bWithQueue)
        Initialize a PL2303HXD driver
        Parameters:
        manager - [in] Initialize a PL2303HXD driver.
        context - [in] Initialize a PL2303HXD driver.
        sAppName - [in] ACTION_USB_PERMISSION string, for example: "tw.com.prolific.pl2303hxdgpio.USB_PERMISSION" "com.prolific.pl2303hxdsimpletest.USB_PERMISSION" "XXX.AAA.CCC.USB_PERMISSION"
        bWithQueue - , Specifies the software 4K Queue buffer is enable or disable

      • PL2303Device_IsSupportChip

        public boolean PL2303Device_IsSupportChip(int index)

        Parameters:

      • PL2303Device_SetCommTimeouts

        public boolean PL2303Device_SetCommTimeouts(int TimeoutConstant)
        The PL2303Device_SetCommTimeouts function sets the time-out parameters for all read and write operations on a specified communications device.
        Parameters:
        TimeoutConstant - : Timeout Constant of read and write
        Returns:
        If the function succeeds, the return value is true. If the function fails, the return value is false.

      • PL2303Device_GetCommTimeouts

        public boolean PL2303Device_GetCommTimeouts(int TimeoutConstant)
        The PL2303Device_GetCommTimeouts function retrieves the time-out parameters for all read and write operations on a specified communications device.
        Parameters:
        TimeoutConstant - : Timeout Constant of read and write
        Returns:
        If the function succeeds, the return value is true. If the function fails, the return value is false.

      • PL2303Device_GetSerialNumber

        public java.lang.String PL2303Device_GetSerialNumber(int index)

      • PL2303TB_Set_PWM

        public int PL2303TB_Set_PWM(int index,
                            int PWM_IO_Num,
                            byte Frequency_value,
                            byte Duty_value)
        PL2303TB supports 4 PWM control output, the frequency range is from 366.3Hz to 46.5 KHz, and the pulse high duty can be set from 1/256 to 255/256 in each frequency.
        Parameters:
        index - [in] usb-device index
        PWM_IO_Num - [in] Pin mapping PWM[0:3] [DTR. DCD, DSR, CTS]
        Frequency_value - [in] It would set the Frequency.
        Duty_value - [in] It would set the Duty.
        Returns:
        Zero indicates success. Nonzero indicates failure.

      • PL2303TB_Enable_GPIO

        public int PL2303TB_Enable_GPIO(int index,
                                int GPIO_Num,
                                boolean Enable)
        PL2303TB has 12 software controllable ¡§General Purpose Input Output¡¨ control signal pin, you can use this API to control the direction of these pin, you also can use "PL2303HXD Enable GPIO" API to control GPIO 0~7 of PL2303TB
        Parameters:
        index - [in] usb-device index
        GPIO_Num - [in] The GPIO number, the range is 0 ~ 12
        Enable - [in] True is Output mode, false is input mode.
        Returns:
        Zero indicates success. Nonzero indicates failure.

      • PL2303HXD_Enable_GPIO

        public int PL2303HXD_Enable_GPIO(int index,
                                 int GPIO_Num,
                                 boolean Enable)
        PL2303HXD has 8 software controllable ¡§General Purpose Input Output¡¨ control signal pin, you can use this API to control the direction of these pin
        Parameters:
        index - [in] usb-device index
        GPIO_Num - [in] The GPIO number, the range is 0 ~ 7
        Enable - [in] True is Output mode, false is input mode.
        Returns:
        Zero indicates success. Nonzero indicates failure.

      • PL2303TB_Set_GPIO_Value

        public int PL2303TB_Set_GPIO_Value(int index,
                                   int GPIO_Num,
                                   int val)
        PL2303TB has 12 software controllable ¡§General Purpose Input Output¡¨ control signal pin, you can use this API to control the status of these pin when the direction is output mode, you also can use "PL2303HXD_Set_GPIO_Value" API to control GPIO 0~7 of PL2303TB
        Parameters:
        index - [in] usb-device index
        GPIO_Num - [in] The GPIO number, the range is 0 ~ 11
        val - [in] ¡§1¡¨ is High level, 0 is low level.
        Returns:
        Zero indicates success. Nonzero indicates failure.
